Title: Cherry
Summary: An Ivy League freshman gets an unexpected education when he falls for an older woman and her 14 year-old daughter develops a crush on him.

Title: Orange
Summary: A man.who doesn't believe that love can last a lifetime.pursues an exuberant romantic.but their clashing ideologies keep them apart.

Title: Apple
Summary: A young elven girl named Apple grows up to be a dark sorceress named Orb.
